document_data.name: Massmorph
document_data.mainbody: '''''Massmorph''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that allowed the caster to alter the form of several willing subjects into trees.
document_data.Effects: This spell only worked on willing participants, allowing the caster to transform many individuals into a specific type of tree. The subjects appeared to be real trees to all senses, but if physically harmed they would bleed as normal. The spell lasted until either the caster released the magic or it was successfully ''[[dispel magic|dispelled]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s a handful of bark chips from the specific tree that the subjects would transform into to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was used by the [[avatar]] of [[Verenestra]].
